alert.note: Alert for Clarion; Forest; Venango (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 01 at 6:30PM EDT until June 01 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN VENANGO...NORTH CENTRAL CLARION AND SOUTHWESTERN FOREST COUNTIES... At 630 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tionesta, or 11 miles east of Oil City, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Tionesta and Fryburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
